page.title: 09At school in Sparkwell.
page.content: On the 4th of June 1985 I got out of bed about 8.00 clock. It was about 25 minutes to 9 when my brother and I left for school. We have to walk about 200 yards. Then about 9.00 clock the bell rang - that told us that we had to go and sit down. Then Sir called out the register before assembly. After assembly we had to go on the carpet in the library area to read. After we had read we had to do crossword puzzles or "Springboard" workbooks until half past 10. Then we went out to play for fifteen minutes. When we came in we did Maths until lunch. After lunch we worked in groups on three huge dragon pictures that we are making from coloured paper and tin-foil. We went swimming and played rounders before going home. Claire Verran.
